#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   	//freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
	int N;
	long long int X, Y;
	cin >> N;
	cin >> X >> Y;
	long long int P = Y - X;
	long long int A[N];
	bool B[P+1];
	long long int MIN = P + 1;
	for(int i = 0; i< N ; i++)
	{
		cin >> A[i];
		A[i]--;
		MIN = min(MIN,A[i]);
	}
	if(X == 0 || P < MIN)
	{
		B[P] = 0;
		goto print;
	}
	for(int i = 0; i<= P ;i++)
	{
		B[i] = 0;
	}
	B[0] = 1;
/*	if(RelativelyPrime(A[0],A[1]) && P > (A[0]*A[1]-A[0]-A[1]))
	{
		B[P] = 1;
		goto print;
	}*/
	for(int i = 1; i <= P; i++)
	{
		if(B[i])
		continue;
		if(i < A[0])
		B[i] = 0;
		else
		{
			for(int j = 0; j< N; j++)
			{
				if( i >= A[j] && B[i - A[j]])
				{
				B[i] = 1;
				break;
				}
			}
			if(B[i] && (!(P%i) || B[P-i]))
			{
			B[P] = 1;
			break;
			}
		}
	}
	print:
	if(B[P])
	cout << "POSSIBLE";
	else
	cout << "IMPOSSIBLE" ;

}
